faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.q1: Can I convert large CSV files to Excel?
faq.a1: Yes! Our tool handles CSV files of various sizes. For very large files (100MB+), the conversion may take a bit longer, but the process is optimized for performance.
faq.q2: Will formatting be preserved during conversion?
faq.a2: CSV files contain only raw data without formatting. The Excel file will have the data properly organized in cells, but you'll need to apply formatting (colors, fonts, borders) manually in Excel after conversion.

meta.title: CSVë¥¼ JSONìœ¼ë¡œ ë³€í™˜ê¸° - ë¬´ë£Œ ì˜¨ë¼ì¸ ë°ì´í„° ë„êµ¬
meta.description: CSVë¥¼ JSONìœ¼ë¡œ - ë¹ ë¥´ê³  ë¬´ë£Œì´ë©° ì‹ ë¢°í•  ìˆ˜ ìˆëŠ” ì˜¨ë¼ì¸ ë„êµ¬ì…ë‹ˆë‹¤.
meta.subtitle: ì „ë¬¸ê°€ìš© CSV JSON ë³€í™˜ ë„êµ¬

content.about_p1: Our free CSV to JSON converter transforms comma-separated values (CSV) into structured JSON format instantly. JSON is the standard data format for modern web applications and APIs, making this tool essential for developers and data analysts.

features_list.1: Instant conversion with smart delimiter detection
features_list.2: Proper handling of nested headers and CSV quotes
features_list.3: 100% Secure - processing happens in your browser
features_list.5: Support for custom delimiters (comma, semicolon, tab, pipe)
features_list.6: One-click copy and JSON file download

migration.title: Data Migration
migration.desc: Easily migrate data from legacy spreadsheets to modern NoSQL databases.

api.title: API Testing
api.desc: Generate JSON request payloads from CSV test data objects.

db.title: Database Seeders
db.desc: Convert CSV datasets into JSON for database seeders and migrations.

analysis.title: Data Analysis
analysis.desc: Transform raw CSV exports into structured JSON for analysis.

faq.q1: Is my CSV data kept private?
faq.a1: Yes, all processing is done locally in your browser. Your data is never uploaded to our servers.
faq.a2: The converter handles large files efficiently, limited only by your browser's memory.
faq.q3: Can I convert JSON back to CSV?
faq.a3: Yes! Use our 'JSON to CSV' tool in the Development section for reverse conversion.

js.error_empty: Please enter CSV data to convert
js.error_no_copy: No JSON to copy. Please convert CSV first.
js.error_no_download: No JSON to download. Please convert CSV first.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.a1: Our tool generates standard SQL INSERT statements compatible with MySQL, PostgreSQL, SQL Server, SQLite, and other major database systems. You can customize the table name and column names as needed.
faq.q2: How do I handle special characters in my CSV data?
faq.a2: The converter automatically escapes special characters (quotes, backslashes) to prevent SQL injection and syntax errors. Your data will be safely converted to properly formatted SQL statements.

meta.subtitle: ì „ë¬¸ê°€ìš© CSV TSV ë³€í™˜ ë„êµ¬

content.about_p1: Our free CSV to TSV converter transforms standard comma-separated values into tab-separated values. TSV files are commonly used in data science, bioinformatics, and legacy database systems that prefer tabs over commas.

features_list.6: Support for all standard CSV formats

migration.title: Data Science
migration.desc: Prepare datasets for R or Python tools that frequently use TSV.

api.title: Database Loading
api.desc: Load data into systems that require tab-separated formats for fast import.

db.title: Bioinformatics
db.desc: Format genomics data which is predominantly stored in TSV formats.

analysis.title: Excel Compatibility
analysis.desc: Copy-paste structured data directly into Excel without delimiter issues.

faq.a1: All conversion happens in your browser's memory, ensuring maximum privacy.
faq.q2: What are the advantages of TSV?
faq.a2: TSV is less prone to errors when your data contains commas (like names or addresses).
faq.q3: Can I convert TSV back to CSV?
faq.a3: Yes, our 'TSV to CSV' tool handles the reverse process instantly.
